languages.text: "Всеобщее восстание будет обречено — астероиды изолированы блюстителями. Мы не можем атаковать Инцендию — у нее больше людей, а отражающее поле ее трона защитит от любого нападения". {n}На губах Наместника возникает коварная ухмылка.{/n} "Значит, попросим Ее Светлость явиться к нам. Надавим на ее самоуверенность. Хочет моей крови — пусть придет и прольет ее".

"A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."
languages.original_text: "Всеобщее восстание будет обречено — астероиды изолированы блюстителями. Мы не можем атаковать Инцендию — у нее больше людей, а отражающее поле ее трона защитит от любого нападения". {n}На губах Наместника возникает коварная ухмылка.{/n} "Значит, попросим Ее Светлость явиться к нам. Надавим на ее самоуверенность. Хочет моей крови — пусть придет и прольет ее".

traits.locale_text: "A general uprising will be doomed. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's reflective field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “全面起义注定会失败，库尔达的执行者已经隔离了那些小行星。而且，我们不能主动进攻因森蒂娅，她手下的士兵更多，而且她的宝座上的偏折力场可以保护她免受一切攻击。”{n}弗拉迪姆嘴角露出了阴险的笑容。{/n}“既然如此，咱们就守株待兔吧。因森蒂娅实在是过于自大，既然她想要我的项上人头，那就让她来拿吧。”
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."

traits.locale_text: “全面起义注定会失败，库尔达的执行者已经隔离了那些小行星。而且，我们不能主动进攻因森蒂娅，她手下的士兵更多，而且她的宝座上的偏折力场可以保护她免受一切攻击。”{n}弗拉迪姆嘴角露出了阴险的笑容。{/n}“既然如此，咱们就守株待兔吧。因森蒂娅实在是过于自信了，既然她想要我的项上人头，那就让她来吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「反乱は絶望的な結果を迎えるだろう。エンフォーサーは小惑星を隔離した。インセンディアを攻撃することは不可能だ。彼女の軍の方が大規模な上に、王座のリフラクター・フィールドがどんな攻撃からも守る」{n}領主の唇に、陰湿な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「だからこそ、彼女には我々について来るようにお願いするのだ。あいつの過信を利用するということだ。血が見たいのなら、吐かせてやるよ」
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱は絶望的な結果を迎えるだろう。エンフォーサーは小惑星を隔離した。インセンディアを攻撃することは不可能だ。彼女の軍の方が大規模な上に、王座のリフラクター・フィールドがどんな攻撃からも守る」{n}領主の唇に、陰湿な笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「だからこそ、彼女には我々について来るようにお願いするのだ。あいつの過信を利用するということだ。血が見たいのなら、吐かせてやるよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Un levantamiento general estaría condenado al fracaso. El personal de seguridad ha aislado los asteroides. No podemos atacar a Incendia, cuenta con más números y el campo refractor de su trono la protegerá de cualquier ataque». {n}Una sonrisa maligna aparece en los labios del Señor.{/n} «Así que le pediremos que venga, aprovechándonos de su exceso de confianza. Si quiere mi sangre, que venga y la derrame».
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."

traits.locale_text: «Un levantamiento general será condenado. El personal de seguridad ha aislado los asteroides. No podemos atacar a Incendia, cuenta con más números y el campo refractor de su trono la protegerá de cualquier ataque». {n}Una sonrisa maligna aparece en los labios del Señor.{/n} «Así que le pediremos que venga, aprovechándonos de su exceso de confianza. Si quiere mi sangre, que venga y la derrame».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ein allgemeiner Aufstand wäre aussichtslos. Die Enforcers haben die Asteroiden isoliert. Wir können Incendia nicht angreifen. Sie ist in der Überzahl und das Refraktorfeld ihres Throns schützt sie vor jedem Angriff." {n}Ein heimtückisches Grinsen erscheint auf den Lippen des Lehnsherren.{/n} "Also bitten wir ihre Ladyschaft, zu uns zu kommen. Wir nutzen ihr übersteigertes Selbstbewusstsein aus. Wenn sie mein Blut will, soll sie kommen und es vergießen."
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."

traits.locale_text: "Ein allgemeiner Aufstand wäre aussichtlos. Die Enforcers haben die Asteroiden isoliert. Wir können Incendia nicht angreifen. Sie ist in der Überzahl und das Refraktorfeld ihres Throns schützt sie vor jedem Angriff." {n}Ein heimtückisches Grinsen erscheint auf den Lippen des Lehnsherren.{/n} "Also bitten wir ihre Ladyschaft, zu uns zu kommen. Wir nutzen ihr übersteigertes Selbstbewusstsein aus. Wenn sie mein Blut will, soll sie kommen und es vergießen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Une émeute générale serait vouée à l'échec, puisque les prévôts ont isolé les astéroïdes. Nous ne pouvons pas frapper Incendia de front : elle a l'avantage du nombre et le champ réfracteur de son trône la protège de toutes les attaques. Nous allons donc demander à Sa Seigneurie de venir à nous, {n}dit le suzerain avec un sourire sournois,{/n} en tirant parti de son excès de confiance. Si c'est mon sang qu'elle veut, qu'elle vienne le faire couler. »
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."

traits.locale_text: « Une émeute générale serait vouée à l'échec, puisque les prévôts ont isolé les astéroïdes. Nous ne pouvons pas frapper Incendia de front : elle a l'avantage du nombre et le champ réfracteur de son trône la protège de toutes les attaques. Nous allons donc demander à Sa Seigneurie de venir à nous, {n}dit le suzerain avec un sourire sournois,{/n} en tirant parti de son excès de confiance. Si c'est mon sang qu'elle veut, qu'elle vienne le faire couler. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Hep birlikte ayaklanırsak kaybetmemiz işten değil. İnfazcılar asteroitleri tecrit etti. Sayı üstünlüğü İncendia'da, ayrıca tahtının ışıkkıran alanı her türden saldırıya karşı onu koruyacaktır." {n}Emîr'in dudaklarında sinsi bir tebessüm beliriyor.{/n} "Bu yüzden Leydi Hazretleri'ni burada ağırlayacağız. Öz güvenini suistimal edeceğiz. Madem kanımı dökmek istiyor, gelsin bakalım."
languages.original_text: "A general uprising will be doomed to fail. The enforcers have isolated the asteroids. We can't strike out against Incendia: she has the greater numbers, and her throne's refractor field will protect her from any attack." {n}An insidious smile appears on the Liege's lips.{/n} "So we'll ask Her Ladyship to come to us. Exploiting her overconfidence. If she wants my blood, let her come and spill it."
